about_the_game:
Embark on an adventure through the Amazon Rainforest, where you will assume the role of the legendary Curupira, the protector of the forest. With the aim of saving endangered animals, you will face incredible challenges, solve puzzles, and learn about the rich biodiversity of the world's largest tropical rainforest.

🦜 Why support this project?

Educational and Fun: The game not only provides entertainment but also educates players about the importance of environmental conservation and the value of the Amazon.
Real Action: Part of the proceeds from this crowdfunding will be directly allocated to the NGO SOS AMAZÔNIA. By supporting this game, you will not only be contributing to a unique digital experience but also assisting in real conservation and protection projects in the Amazon.
Cultural Connection: The game values and preserves the intangible cultural heritage of the Amazon. This game is a celebration of its legends, animals, and Amazonian peoples.

🐾 Game Features

Charming 2D/3D graphics, capturing the beauty and diversity of the Amazon.
Engaging story based on Amazonian legends and myths.
Challenging puzzles and captivating gameplay.
Interact and help a variety of animals, each with their own stories and challenges.
The game will have 5 main stages, each stage with 3 sub-stages, where in the 1st and 2nd the player will face challenges and waves of enemies and the 3rd the main boss.
The game will be developed for PC, hosted on the STEAM platform.
Each stage will aim to save one of the following animals: Amazonian Manatee (Trichechus inunguis), Golden Parakeet (Guaruba guarouba), Giant Otter (Pteronura brasiliensis), Margay (Leopardus wiedii), and Spider Monkey (Ateles marginatus).

Your help is essential!
The Amazon contributes to the regulation of the planet's climate, and every small action in its defense has a profound impact. By funding "Amazon Alive: Animals in Extinction," you become part of the solution, connecting virtual and real worlds on a preservation mission.

Come join this adventure! Join us on the mission to save the Amazon and its mysterious and magnificent animals! 🍃🐆🌎

With the goal of saving endangered animals, you will face incredible challenges and learn about the rich biodiversity of the world's largest tropical forest.
